game.name: Putt Down
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Putt down is a first person mini-golf horror game, where you use a shotgun as a putter. Keep your shotgun in good condition and your stress levels in check while battling both randomized golf courses and horrific monsters. Will you survive or will you be putt down.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Putt down is a first person mini-golf horror game, where you use a shotgun as a putter. Keep your shotgun in good condition and your stress levels in check while battling both randomized golf courses and horrific monsters. Will you survive or will you be putt down.
